channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Justice Department subpoenas Walz and others in immigration enforcement obstruction investigation
item.description: Federal prosecutors have served six grand jury subpoenas to Minnesota officials as part of an investigation into whether they obstructed or impeded federal law enforcement during a sweeping immigration operation in Minneapolis-St. Paul area.

item.title: Forecasters warn of a ‘potentially catastrophic’ storm from Texas to the Carolinas
Christian leaders urge protecting worshippers’ rights after protesters interrupt service
